Variable.name: syncAll
Variable.Description: Set to true to enable full synchronization over all accounts.

Variable.name: targetApplications
Variable.Description: Set to a csv or List(String) of Application names that will be synchronized.

Variable.name: identityName
Variable.Description: Name of the Identity whose password has changed.

Variable.name: applicationName
Variable.Description: Name of the Application where the password change was detected.

Variable.name: nativeIdentity
Variable.Description: Name of the account on the Application where the password change was detected.

Variable.name: project
Variable.Description: A ProvisionignProject compiled from the target list.

Step.name: Compile Project
Step.Description: Perform the default password synchronization using the supplied application list.

Step.name: Examine Project
Step.Description: This is a placeholder for custom code that may want to alter the project before execution.

Step.name: Provision
Step.Description: Execute the password synchronization project. We call the standard subprocess that handles retries. Note that the disableIdentityRequests option is passed to prevent logging a warning since this workflow does not maintain IdentityRequest objects.

Step.name: Audit
Step.Description: Placeholder, what kind of auditing should we do? We've got low level ProvisioningResults in the project.

Step.name: Empty Project
Step.Description: Here if there wasn't enough to build a project. If there were missing inputs there should be errors in the log. We could just be here because there were no sync targets.
